programme.title: Kin
programme.desc: Kenneth is resistant when Ananya suggests pitching his ride-hailing app to KSUH. Eunice is concerned that Shen Yang's history of mental illness might affect the work he is doing on the free clinic.

programme.title: The Titan Games
programme.desc: Dwayne Johnson presents and stars in "The Titan Games," a groundbreaking new athletic competition based on Dwayne's belief that within each and every one of us is the potential for greatness.

programme.title: Ellen's Game Of Games S3
programme.desc: New season of the popular and fun gameshow. Volunteers from Ellen's studio audience play her outrageously fun games including Blindfolded Musical Chairs, Son of a One Eyed Monster, Taste Buds, Scary Go Round, Know or Go and more for the chance to win $100,000.

programme.title: Arts 21
programme.desc: ARTS 21 is an arts magazine show focusing on the latest news and events on the culture scene.

programme.title: Euromaxx
programme.desc: Euromaxx is a lifestyle magazine show which features images and stories that reflect the rich diversity of cultural life in Europe. It also provides an insight into Europe and the people who live there.

programme.title: Luke Nguyen's UK
programme.desc: With his heritage never too far away, coupled with his passion for food, Luke unearths the multicultural diversity that has changed the tastebuds in the United Kingdom. Luke embarks on a culinary exploration around the UK unearthing the unique, the quirky and mouth-watering food delicacies of this historic and fascinating island. He travels through England to Wales, Scotland and then back to London where he meets wonderful characters along the way.

programme.title: Jamie: Keep Cooking And Carry On
programme.desc: Jamie brings us his most ingenious, delicious ways to use up those kitchen cupboard staples and back-of-the- freezer forgotten finds. He teaches us how to make great use of what we already have in our fridges and cupboards, and where we can make swaps in recipes when we have missing ingredients. More pragmatic and enjoyable than ever, Jamie demonstrates simple ways to make surprisingly delicious meals out of pantry classics.

programme.title: Just for Laughs Gags S20
programme.desc: Just For Laughs will tickle everyone's funny bone with its hilarious practical jokes, hidden camera pranks, and other creative hijinks.

programme.title: The World's Deadliest Weather S2
programme.desc: Revealing archives and real footages of the meteorological phenomena, witness some of the most deadly natural disasters the planet has ever seen.

programme.title: Sunshine Station
programme.desc: Jimmy and Jenny run a very special bus station - the Sunshine Station! It isn't just a place you go to get to a destination. It is a destination in itself - a destination of endless fun, songs, dances, discovery and wonders! At the Sunshine Station, pre-schoolers embark on a learning journey to discover the world around them by going to various interesting locations around Singapore.

programme.title: Hiccup & Sneeze
programme.desc: Bibi wants to change her hairstyle. She tries on a wig, intending to get Hiccup and Sneeze's opinion of how she looks, but they don't recognize her! So she plays a trick on them and puts on different wigs, pretending to be different people.

programme.title: Barbie Dreamtopia S1
programme.desc: Barbie's youngest sister, Chelsea, takes us on a fantastical journey to the land of her dreams. Together with their friends, Chelsea and Barbie embark on amazing adventures as they explore exciting new lands full of limitless possibility and important life lessons.

programme.title: Paw Patrol S5
programme.desc: Get ready for a tail-wagging good time in these rescue adventures with the PAW Patrol! No job is too big, no pup is too small as Ryder and the pups are always ready to lend a paw.

programme.title: Tayo The Little Bus S4
programme.desc: Hana can no longer ignore Rogi's garage that is full of junk and tells him to throw it all away. Rogi loves all his belongings and decides to give everything away to his friends instead of throwing it all out. Unfortunately, no one seems interested and Rogi is very disappointed. He decides to throw it all away. The little buses cheer him up and go around the city telling everyone about the stuff Rogi is giving away. People and cars visit his garage and are delighted to find things they need.

programme.title: Counting With Paula S6
programme.desc: Mr Farmer needs the children to help on his farm but doesn't give clear instructions. Paula took matters into own hands and her over confidence lead to a giant mess, teaching a valuable lesson. The children head over to Treasure Island to help Maurice find his missing sailor handbook. Turns out the crabs ripped it apart and sent the children down a chasing spree for the missing pages.

programme.title: My Little Pony: Friendship Is Magic S9
programme.desc: This series follows a pony named Twilight Sparkle as she learns about friendship in the town of Ponyville with her friends. The ponies share adventures and help other residents of Ponyville, while working out the troublesome moments in their own friendship.

programme.title: PJ Masks S3
programme.desc: Join Catboy, Owlette and Gekko as the heroic trio goes into the night to save the day!

programme.title: Pokemon Journeys: The Series S23
programme.desc: What begins as a curse for our hero ends up being a wonderful surprise for all!

programme.title: Word Whiz S4
programme.desc: Dr Slime is back with more slime and a new and improved slime lab! Contestants will have to beat Dr Slime by solving the word puzzles, otherwise they'll get slimed and be stuck in his game forever as a minion!

programme.title: The Haunted House: Secret Of The Ghost Ball
programme.desc: There is something not quite right about Shinbi Apartment. Ever since siblings Hari and Doori moved in, they could tell right away that everything seemed a little off. Is it the look? Is it the feel? Is it the smell? Maybe it is the ghosts!

programme.title: Beyblade Burst S1
programme.desc: With a shot at the team battles final on the line, the Beigoma Academy Bey Club strategizes how to takedown the Beasts. Valtryek's super awakening gives Valt a boost, but will it be enough to counter Betromoth's fierce attacks? Meanwhile, the Superstars and Rideout duke it out in a match of their own.

programme.title: Far Flung with Gary Mehigan
programme.desc: Gary is nearing the end of his travels, and as he heads to Hong Kong, he has Dumplings on his mind. He heads over to Mongkok to taste the famous One Michelen starred, Tim Ho Wan's dumplings, and its well worth the trip. Gary then goes from one extreme, eating Snake soup and seeing it prepared, to another, visiting Sham Shui Po and tasting some amazing desserts and sweets.

programme.title: 128 Circle
programme.desc: A case of food poisoning at 128 Circle puts both Aishah and Nurul's mee rebus stalls under scrutiny. Unable to bear the brunt of the upheavals, Chandra lands himself in hospital. The dessert stall closes down as Yi Kai contemplates a move to JB, leaving Audrey behind.

programme.title: 邻里来爆料
programme.desc: (重) 为客工免费做造型拍照，摄影师Eric是客工口中的“甜心爸爸”。在网站超市购物，还能做善事，每购买一件物品，都能积累成多，捐赠给有需要的人。五星级酒店厨師，因行差踏错转战熟食中心，以蒸食虏获饕客的味蕾。.

programme.title: 分界线
programme.desc: (重) 地处于俄罗斯和中国分界线，额尔古纳河畔的室韦，住着一群俄罗斯族和汉族人通婚后，统称为华俄后裔的中国人。他们曾经历过了历史带来的伤痛，如今面对着文化传承的挑战。从30年前的农耕小村庄，到现在被誉为中国十大魅力名镇。这群俄罗斯族的中国人，是否面对着身份认同的困扰？在面对经济转型的同时，又会否流失了传承自俄罗斯的传统文化？.

programme.title: 没有名字的女人
programme.desc: (PG)(重)(双声道-中/韩) 尹雪从医院的医生得知小春还活着，坚持要找回小春。为了让武烈在集团和家里有底气，海珠将自己在WID集团拥有的全部股份都转给金武烈。玛亚将英国朋友小春带回家住，智媛听到对方叫小春就很不开心，只让大家在家里叫她为英文名Kelly。.

programme.title: 铁石心肠
programme.desc: (PG-些许暴力画面)(重) 曼姨找西达谈判却遭西达暗算。.

programme.title: 坏爱情
programme.desc: (PG)(双声道-中/韩) 朴室长无意间得知恩惠还活着，十分意外。华兰更是气急败坏，要朴室长负责。在赫一直联络不到恩惠，求朴室长帮忙，朴室长却给了他假资讯。.

programme.title: 坏爱情
programme.desc: (PG-部分画面令人不安)(双声道-中/韩) 崔浩镇头部受创，失去了部分记忆，忘了和妍秀的一段情及他们的孩子敏雅。崔素媛见弟弟失忆，决心将敏雅当成自己的孩子抚养。.

programme.title: 背游南美的北边
programme.desc: (PG)(首播) 背游系列由中美起步，走过中亚，到过北非的摩洛哥；第四辑节目回到最初的起点，延续中美旅程，走入南美。很多人对秘鲁、巴西、阿根廷这些大国有认识，但南美北边的哥伦比亚和厄瓜多尔呢？梁彦宗住进水上民宿、投入超大型新年节庆、探索亚马逊森林、登上进化岛、寻找巨型陆龟、潜入水底与大型鲨鱼群共舞。南美的顶端，容易被遗忘，但绝对不能错过。.

programme.title: 翻新援助行动
programme.desc: 菲扎的新家虽然看起来保养得很好，但里面却隐藏着各种危机。地板有让人跌倒的危险，房子里充满了积水问题，这是她和她患有脑瘫的儿子达奇弗要关注的问题。他们能得到他们梦想中的家吗？.

programme.title: 解决师
programme.desc: (PG13-暴力镜头) 高俊一直联络不到敖老师，怀疑他去了澳洲查姐姐的死因，因担心他会遭到黑帮的追杀, 高俊逼不得已向在澳洲的乔菲求助找他。.

programme.title: 晚间新闻包括国会摘要
programme.desc: U频道《晚间新闻》，在半小时里除深入报道本地与国际要闻，还有详尽的财经新闻和体坛动态。世界局势与经济动脉，让大家轻松掌握。.

programme.title: 台湾1001个故事 S5
programme.desc: (重) 介绍台湾当地的美食与老板背后的故事.

programme.title: 世界多美丽
programme.desc: (重)《世界多美丽》是一档真人秀纪实类旅游栏目。将在世界范围内美丽、知名、热议话题目的地旅游体验，通过资深旅游达人的深度游视觉，在目的地，深入旅游体验和大家共享热点话题、旅行感悟，发现新视野，展现不一样的旅行新魅力。.

programme.title: 打工捱世界 S2
programme.desc: (重) 这一季的《打工捱世界》，袁伟豪（Ben）和杨明（阿杨）将从游客看不到的角度认识非洲坦桑尼亚和意大利威尼斯。非洲坦桑尼亚并非一个富裕国家，他们在当地打工后有什么体验，又是否会感到富足？ 在「旅游天堂」意大利威尼斯打工依旧是要从低做起！担任渔民，天还没亮便要开工，辛劳而不浪漫。二人还要出卖劳力送货、街头卖艺，又担当餐厅侍应生招呼客人，吸取不一样的工作体验。.

programme.title: 没有名字的女人
programme.desc: (PG)(重)(双声道-中/韩) 尹雪知道春儿被金顺带去英国，尹雪父亲决定替尹雪去英国搜集情报。尹雪以2%的WID股份将土地卖给道英,他认为这块土地会让WID集团获得新生。.

programme.title: 铁石心肠
programme.desc: (PG-些许暴力画面)(重) 颂萨得知石拉就是自己的儿子涛。他决定帮助涛。.

programme.title: 坏爱情
programme.desc: (PG)(双声道-中/韩) 素媛隐瞒敏雅的身世，让敏雅改名为崔夏恩。素媛多年来仍持续查着恩惠真正死因。她发现肇事车辆是路维集团所有，于是去应征工作，进入公司查案。.

programme.title: 坏爱情
programme.desc: (PG)(双声道-中/韩) 妍秀主动找上华兰，说要帮敏赫当上集团继承人。妍秀誓言要将敏赫变成自己的男人。.

programme.title: 边缘儿童
programme.desc: 在马来西亚有超过十万名罗兴亚难民生活在看不见的角落里。始于缅甸若开邦的种族清洗运动使得他们投奔怒海、徒步千里，向邻近的国家逃亡，引发了难民危机，甚至被联合国定调为世界上“最受迫害”的族群。但在异乡落地生根的孩童始终未能迎来否极泰来的安定生活。如果远走他乡是他们现时的宿命，哪里才是他们的应许之地？.

programme.title: 解决师
programme.desc: (PG13-暴力镜头) 敖老师养伤期间，多得乔菲悉心照顾，二人终成为情侣。Ace(埃斯)察觉浩全行为有异，于是偷偷地跟踪他。。。。。。.
